section.title: Manage Page Navigation
section.para: In order to understand clearly about what the navigation is and navigation types that GateIn Portal supports, please refer the page.

section.title: Creating a portal's navigation
section.para: The page navigation of a portal is created automatically when a portal is created.

section.title: Editing a portal's navigation
section.para: Only users who have the edit right on a portal can perform this action.
Follows these below guides to edit a portal's navigation:

step.para: Go to GateIn Start-> Administration -> Advanced--> Edit Page and Navigation.
Select Portal navigation in list on the left pane (eg: portal: classic's Nav).
Right click the blank space on the left pane and select Edit Navigation in the menu:
The form for editing the portal navigation will be opened:
The number that users select in the Priority field is the priority of a page navigation on the Navigation bar.
Make changes to fields in this form: Description, Priority.
Click the Save button to accept changes.
Click the!images/OKIcon.png! to take effect of new change or click the Cancel button to quit without saving any change.

section.title: Deleting a portal's navigation
section.para: No one can create the portal's page navigation so no one can delete it. A navigation is deleted automatically after you delete its portal.

section.title: Group's page navigation
section.para: Each group has only one page navigation. Only users of that group have the "manager" membership can create/edit/delete navigation for that group

step.para: Go to GateIn Start -> Administration -> Advanced --> Edit Page and Navigation.
Select a Group navigation in the list on the left pane (eg: group:platform/administrator's Nav). All pages of this group will be listed underneath.
Right click the blank space on the left pane and select Edit Navigation in the context menu:
The form for editing the group navigation will be opened:
Make changes for two fields: Description and Priority.
The number that users select in the Priority field is the priority of a page navigation on the Navigation bar.
Click the Save button to accept any changes.
Click the!images/OKIcon.png! to take effect new changes on the Navigation bar or click the Cancel button to quit without saving any change.

section.title: Creating a user's navigation
section.para: The page navigation of a user is created automatically when a user is created (registered). So an administrator don't have to create it.

section.title: Editing a user's navigation
section.para: Only the user who is the owner of the user page navigation can edit it.

section.title: Deleting a user's navigation
section.para: No one can create user's page navigation so that no one can delete it. A user's navigation is deleted automatically when its user is deleted.
